name: Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray – Pet Stain and Odor Remover, Carpet Cleaner Solution for Cat and Dog Urine, 32 Fl Oz
short_description: 1. DESTROYS URINE ODORS THE FIRST TIME Urine elimination technology neutralizes and removes odors on contact for immediate freshness
2. REMOVES PET STAINS AND MORE Penetrates deep to lift and remove tough pet stains like feces, vomit, dirt and their odors
3. HELPS PREVENT REMARKING Discourages pets from returning to make a mess in the same spot
4. SAFE FOR ALL SOFT SURFACE AREAS Effective of carpets, upholstery, and area rugs for versatile cleaning.
5. FROM THE #1 PET MESS CLEANING BRAND*: Trusted by pet owners for superior cleaning performance. *Based on unit sales of pet mess cleaning products ending latest 52 weeks 6/15/24
6. SUITABLE TO USE AROUND PETS: Suitable for use around cats & dogs when used as directed
product_description: Say goodbye to stubborn urine messes with Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray, a powerful cleaning solution designed to break down tough urine stains and eliminate strong, lingering odors. Formulated to penetrate deep into carpet fibers and soft surfaces, this spray targets the proteins and residues that cause persistent discoloration and unpleasant smells. Whether you’re dealing with a pet accident, a potty‑training oops, or an unexpected spill, Resolve Urine Destroyer gets to work fast—lifting stains and neutralizing odors at the source. By completely removing odor‑causing cues, it also helps prevent pets from returning to the same spot, supporting better training and a cleaner home. Safe for use around pets when applied as directed, this versatile spray is perfect for carpets, rugs, upholstery, and other soft surfaces throughout your home. With Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray, you can restore freshness, improve cleanliness, and keep your spaces feeling comfortable and odor‑free.

name: Pet Odor Eliminator Spray – Instantly Destroys Odors & Pet Smells by Ti-Oxy™ Technology. Non-Toxic, Fragrance-free & Pet-Safe Odor Neutralizer. Works on Urine Odors, Litter Boxes & Carpets – 10oz
short_description: 【Instantly Destroys Odor — No Masking, No Added Fragrance】Eliminates stubborn pet odors fast—without covering them up with perfume. The deodorizer is designed for everyday pet odors that cling to fabrics and household surfaces, so your space smells truly fresh again the moment you spray.

【Patented Ti-Oxy Technology for True Odor Neutralization】This isn’t your average pet odor spray . Our exclusive Ti-Oxy formula goes beyond masking by breaking down odor-causing molecules into harmless water and carbon dioxide—delivering a deeper, longer-lasting freshness you can trust throughout your home.

【Safe, Unscented, and Family-Friendly】Free from added fragrances and harsh chemicals. Nova-air pet smell remover is non-toxic and gentle for homes with pets, kids, and scent-sensitive users—so you can use this pet-safe odor neutralizer freely without irritating smells or chemical worries.

【Best for Everyday Pet Odors】Versatile and convenient cat & dog odor eliminator for home—perfect for pet bedding, litter boxes, pet accessories, sofas, carpets, fabric surfaces, and even your car. The ultra-fine mist sprays evenly without over-wetting. Simply remove the waste, then spray generously to reach deep odors.

【Long-Lasting Freshness You Can Count On】Ti-Oxy technology creates an invisible, active shield that keeps working between uses, continuously breaking down new odors and airborne particles for continuous odor control. Come home to a space that stays cleaner, fresher, and more comfortable.

name: POOPH Pet Odor Eliminator, 32oz - Eliminates Odors at The Molecular Level, Dogs, Cats, Freshener, Eliminator, Urine, Poop, Pee, Deodorizer, Natures, Puppy, Fresh, Clean, Furniture, Potty
short_description: POOPH SAFELY eliminates the toughest odors WITHOUT fragrances or harmful ingredients. It’s smarter to ELIMINATE odors instead of COVERING THEM UP with fragrances Fragrances can be particularly irritating for dogs and cats who have 10,000X greater sense of smell than people! Even fragrances that smell good in household products have been characterized as potentially dangerous “indoor air pollutants” associated with a wide range of unexpected health consequences—so choose the products that get into your home wisely!
Proprietary technology eliminates odors at the source, leaving NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
POOPH SAFELY eliminates “stink” from carpets, rugs, upholstery, drapes or hard surfaces and leaves no NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
Ideal for urine, feces, vomit, sour, spoiled and nasty food odors, garbage cans, stinky upholstery and more.
POOPH is eco-conscious and SAFE for people, pets, and plants because it contains no fragrances harmful ingredients.

name: Odorcide K.O.E Kennel Odor Eliminator Concentrate – For Cages, Runs & More – For Home & Kennel w/Safe, Non-Enzymatic Formula (Fresh Scent, 16 oz)
short_description: Use What the Pros Use: Thornell is the top provider of pet smell odor eliminator products to the veterinary industry in North America. This powerful K.O.E. pet odor exterminator with a new fresh scent is designed to remove offensive odors from cages, runs, kennels, floors, tables, walls, and other large areas.

Tough on Odors: Use this pet odor remover to permanently and immediately remove odors in the first application, saving you time and money. This odor remover for house, clinics, groomers, and kennels penetrates to the source of the odor where other odor neutralizer sprays and concentrates only treat surface problems.

Not an Enzyme, not a Mask: Our dog and cat odor eliminator features a unique non-enzymatic formula that works regardless of what application you have used before. K.O.E. cat and dog odor remover concentrate works where other odor enzyme cleaner products haven’t and cannot.

Easy to Use: Dilute KOE kennel odor eliminator concentrate with the recommended amount of water or cleaning solution. To reach the odor source, saturate the soiled area. The same dilution may be applied with a pump-up sprayer. Let air dry. If the odor persists after the concentrated deodorizer odor eliminator has dried, then reapply.

Safe for Small Pets & Children: No need to fear, pets and children can safely be around areas treated with K.O.E. dog and cat pee odor eliminator immediately after use. Our kennel and home odor eliminator products are non-harmful, non-allergenic, biodegradable, and safe for use on any surface.

name: Nature's Miracle Advanced Cat Stain and Odor Eliminator Spray, Severe Mess Enzymatic Formula, 32 fl oz
short_description: FOR SEVERE CAT MESSES: Powerful enzymatic formula works to eliminate tough stains and odors from cat urine, diarrhea, vomit and other bio-based accidents.
LIGHT FRESH SCENT: Cat odor control formula gets your home smelling clean again.
ENZYMATIC FORMULA: Continues working as long as any bio-based mess is still present.
DISCOURAGES RESOILING: Removes the odor from even the toughest cat messes.
TRUSTED BRAND: From the maker of Nature’s Miracle products, the pet stain and odor removing brand you trust… because it works!
product_description: Nature’s Miracle® pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 35 years. Whatever pets do, you can trust Nature’s Miracle stain and odor removers, training aids, disinfectants and litter products to undo. Accidents happen, as every cat owner knows. Nature’s Miracle Advanced Stain & Odor Eliminator for cats is an enzymatic, severe-mess stain and odor remover that actually discourages re-soiling by removing the odor of even the toughest cat messes! Bacteria-based formulas produce enzymes when they come into contact with a food source – pet urine, feces, vomit and other bio-based messes. This enzymatic cleaner continues working as long as the food source is present. Freshens with a light fresh scent. Use on carpets, hard floors, furniture, fabrics and more (see the product label for a complete list of fabrics). Do not use on untreated hardwood, leather, suede, silk or wool specialty fabrics. Always use this product at full strength. Just spray, wait 10 minutes, then blot up stain with a white cloth. When used as directed, this product is safe to use around your pets and in your home. Always use Nature’s Miracle products first. Other cleaners and detergents may fail and chemically “set” stains that will be impossible to remove.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.67 x 2.89 x 11.07 inches; 2 Pounds
Best Sellers Rank: #997 in Pet Supplies ( See Top 100 in Pet Supplies ) #3 in Cat Stain Removers

name: PET Odor Neutralizing Pet Freshening Spray, Nano-Activated, 98% Natural, Alcohol-Free Grooming Spray for Dogs, Cats & Fabrics, Long-Lasting Touch-Release Fragrance - Spring Mist (50mL)
short_description: Nano-Activated Freshness: Powered by patent-pending nano-encapsulation technology, the fragrance releases only when touched—providing long-lasting freshness for pets, beds, blankets, and fabrics without evaporation or waste.

98% Natural & Pet-Safe: Formulated with 98% natural ingredients and zero harsh chemicals, this spray is gentle for sensitive skin, safe for daily use, and eco-friendly for your home and pet environment.

Alcohol-Free for Healthy, Shiny Fur: Unlike alcohol-based sprays that can dry out the coat, NanoSCENT PET nourishes your pet’s skin and fur—leaving it visibly softer, shinier, and healthier with every application.

Dual-Action: Pets + Textiles: Use directly on your pet or on any fabric surface—pet beds, blankets, pillows, clothing, furniture. A nano-layer forms as it dries, releasing fragrance whenever touched, sat on, or cuddled.
Powerful Odor Neutralizer: Eliminates odors at the source instead of masking them. Perfect for wet dog smell, litter box areas, pet beds, and homes with multiple animals.
Touch-Release Technology: The scent activates when your pet is petted, hugged, or brushed—and when fabrics are touched—delivering instant bursts of freshness exactly when needed.

Long-Lasting Results: Freshness lasts 3–5 days on fur and 1–2 weeks on fabrics depending on use. The nano-layer remains until worn away or washed, giving you long-lasting odor control with less product.

Gentle Enough for Puppies, Kittens & Seniors: Vet-friendly formulation is hypoallergenic, non-toxic, and safe for pets of all ages. Ideal for sensitive, elderly, or newly-adopted pets who need gentle care.
No Mess, No Stains: Dries clear in minutes and won’t stain or leave residue on fabrics or fur. Perfect for use after grooming, between baths, or during daily routines.
Easy to Use Anywhere: Spray directly onto fur (or onto your hands for noise-sensitive pets) and let dry. For fabrics, spray evenly, allow to dry, and enjoy effortless, touch-activated freshness.

name: Mrs. MEYER'S CLEAN DAY Pet Stain & Odor Fighter, Orange Blossom Scent, 16oz
short_description: HARDWORKING: A made-for-your-pet cleaner is great for cleaning up typical pet messes and stinks like accidents and odors on soft surfaces

MADE WITH POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Crafted with micro-helpers for up to 7 days of continuous cleaning power, odor neutralizing technology, and essential oils to tame pet smells and stinks right at the source opposed to masking them
FOR HARD-TO-CLEAN SOFT SURFACES: Made to be used on carpets, rugs, upholstery, bedding, and clothing
SCENTS DESIGNED WITH PEOPLE AND PETS IN MIND: Our Orange Blossom scent smells like a bright, floral burst of blooming citrus—keeping your pet’s space smelling as fresh as a sunny orchard
A CLEAN YOU CAN TRUST: Made of USDA Biobased formulas and recyclable bottles. Always Leaping Bunny Cruelty-Free and made without bleach, hydrogen peroxide, parabens, phthalates, and glycol solvents
product_description: Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day for your pets. Our new Stain & Odor Fighter is tough on pet messes and accidents but friendly on whiskers and paws. With scents designed with people and pets in mind, this hardworking product fights pet stains and odors for up to 7 days with the power of probiotics for all your soft surfaces—from carpets, rugs and couches to bedding, upholstery, and clothing. Because everybody (especially our pets!) oops sometimes.

name: Pet-Pourri Smell Ya Litter Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray, Purrfectly Bamboo 3.4 Fl Oz, Up to 170 Uses, Pet Odor Remover with Essential Oils for Air, Carpet, Urine, Vet Recommended, Bergamot Bamboo Scent
short_description: Instant Freshness, No Lingering Odors: A few sprays of Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo odor neutralizer spray instantly deodorize cat odors, especially strong urine and litter box smells, so your home stays fresh and inviting

Multi-Purpose and Whole Home Friendly: Safe for use in the air, litter box, and on fabrics, to freshen up furniture, rugs, carpet, curtains, and any place kitty funks linger. Infused with Pourri's Funk Lock Technology to lock in odors

Cat-Friendly Formula: Unlike standard air fresheners, this deodorizing spray can be used directly in the litter box to maintain freshness between pees, poops and scoops. Free from harsh ingredients for a gentle experience for your fluffy feline friend

Naturally Long-Lasting Fragrance: Infused with Bergamot, Jasmine and Bamboo, this formula leaves behind a calming, fresh aroma that helps make litter box duty a little less doody. Simply spritz 3–5 times in a clean litter box for a sweet, inviting scent

Fresh and Clean Formula: Pet Pourri spray is made with natural plant-based ingredients and essential oils. Leaping Bunny Certified, never tested on animals and formulated without dyes, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, because your pet's health matters

One Brand, All the Funk: The Pourri Promise means plant-based, stink-stopping sprays that actually work. Whether it’s your trash can, shoes, diaper pail, fabric, or your furry friend’s corner—there’s a Pourri for that - just spray and go
product_description: Poo-Pourri Smell Ya Purrfectly Bamboo Litter Deodorizer Spray Love your cat, not their litter box smell? That’s where Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray comes in. With just a few spritzes, our Proprietary Funk Lock Technology neutralizes tough odors—especially strong urine and litter box smells—so your home stays fresh and inviting. Infused with a relaxing blend of Bergamot, Jasmine, Bamboo and Pear, it refreshes the air and fabrics while keeping your litter box smelling clean between scoops. Suitable for whole-home freshness, Purrfectly Bamboo works in the air, on furniture, rugs, curtains, and any place kitty funk lingers. Made with natural, plant-based ingredients and essential oils, this litter box spray is never tested on animals and contains no dyes, sulfates, parabens, or phthalates, gentle enough to spray directly in the litter box. Simply spritz 3-5 times inside the clean litter box, fill with litter, and enjoy a fresh, clean scent as it freshens the odor.  From the makers of Poo~Pourri, Pet-Pourri lives up to the Pourri Promise—plant-based, stink-stopping solutions that work anywhere odors lurk. Whether it’s shoes, trash cans, diaper pails, fabrics, or your furry friend’s favorite spot, there’s a Pourri for that.
